name: Deadly Premonition 2: A Blessing in Disguise
summary:
A sequel to 2010’s cult favorite Deadly Premonition is finally on its way and it will release on Nintendo Switch.
The sequel will follow FBI agent Aaliyah Davis as she investigates an old serial killer case in Boston. Aaliyah’s new case also has a connection to a 14-year-old case in New Orleans that was investigated by FBI agent Francis York Morgan, the protagonist of the first game. Players will control both characters, it seems, as their stories intersect and reveal clues about each other’s cases.
